Description: Employment: Full Time We are seeking an experienced Legal Secretary to join the Jeddah office of this reputable law firm. As a Legal Secretary, you will be responsible for providing administrative support to Partners and Associates. Your days will be varied with tasks coming to you from across all practice areas including Litigation, Corporate, and Dispute Resolution.Responsibilities:* Manage calendars and schedule appointments for the Partners and Associates.* Assist in the preparation of legal documents, such as briefs, agreements and contracts.* Coordinate meetings and conferences, both internally and with clients.* Prepare and process legal forms and documents, including filing with courts and government agencies.* Handle client inquiries and communications, both in person and by phone or email.* Manage case files and maintain accurate records.* Conduct legal research as needed.* Other duties as assigned.Skills
Skills: * Previous experience as a Legal Secretary, preferably in a law firm setting.
* Excellent organizational and time management skills.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and legal software.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in Arabic and English.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Knowledge of legal terminology and procedures.
